means: 一时的兴致( whim的名词复数 )
wellhead inspection and maintenance system 井口观察和维修系统
wet high-intensity magnetic separation 湿式高强度磁选

sentence.Network_en: The mate observed regretfully that he could not account for that young fellow's whims.
sentence.Network_cn: 那位伙伴很遗憾地说他不能说出那年轻人产生怪念头的原因.

sentence.Network_en: With the reduction in foreign investments, the government will be even more a hostage to the whims of the international oil price.
sentence.Network_cn: 随着外资的减少，政府将更加受制于起伏不定的国际油价。

sentence.Network_en: The rest she had for food and her own whims.
sentence.Network_cn: 剩下的钱她用来吃饭和买一些自己喜欢的东西.

PerfectNetExp.abs: whimper 啜泣着说, whims 虚妄, whimpering 幽咽
it was not easy to resist the allurements of a way of life which enabled me to cater for Marguerite's innumerable whims without feeling the pinch .这样的生活可以让我毫无困难地满足玛格丽特成千种的任性要求，但要维持这种生活却是不容易的。

despite such bravado , Johnson's essential belief was that Fannie would always be vulnerable to the whims of politicians because so few people really understood what Fannie did .虽说表面上气势汹汹，但约翰逊骨子里认为，房利美总是有可能受到头脑发热的政客们的伤害，因为很少有人真正理解房利美在做什么。
Therefore , you are more vulnerable to the whims illogical , which could then be greatly regretted., 因此 , 你很容易被不合逻辑的幻想所左右 , 接下来就是悔恨.

list.abs: Without this , the divine will is simply irrational whim ., 离开了这点 , 神的意志将只是没有理性的心血来潮.
I had a sudden whim to take a walk ., 我突然想去散步.
A sudden whim to buy a cream cake ., 去买奶油蛋糕的一个突然的怪念头.
fancy : the mental faculty through which whims , visions , and fantasies are summoned up ; imagination , especially a whimsical or fantastic nature .想象力：心智机能，能产生想法、幻想、想象；想象，尤指有异想天开或空想的特性的。
His mother spoiled him indulging his every whim ., 他的妈妈溺爱他 , 总是满足他的各种要求.
He dotes on his grandchildren and indulges their every whim ., 他溺爱自己的孙辈 , 并且满足他们的任何想法.

entry.tran: 一时的兴致;心血来潮;突发的奇想
entry.def: A whim is a wish to do or have something which seems to have no serious reason or purpose behind it, and often occurs suddenly.

example.ex: We decided, more or less on a whim, to sail to Morocco...
example.tran: 我们多少有点心血来潮，决定航海去摩洛哥。

example.ex: The premium can increase at the whim of the insurers...
example.tran: 保险公司可以随时提高保费。

auth_sentence.content: The whims of Internet audiences are unpredictable.
auth_sentence.res_content: The whims of Internet audiences are unpredictable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The whims of Internet audiences are unpredictable.

auth_sentence.content: A woman's whims have to be respected, however apparently absurd.
auth_sentence.res_content: A woman's whims have to be respected, however apparently absurd.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A woman's whims have to be respected, however apparently absurd.

auth_sentence.content: Things are better now but she has her whims, her caprices.
auth_sentence.res_content: Things are better now but she has her whims, her caprices.
